item.description: PLEASE NOTE THE TIME CHANGE!! THE THEATER HAS FINALLY RELEASED THEIR SCHEDULE. This month's event will be a meetup to see "American Gangster" with Denzel Washington and Russell Crowe at AMC Loews Plainville on Wed. November 7th. We will meet in the lobby around 7:30 for the 7:50 show. I will be wearing a Red Sox pullover so you all can identify me. Afterwards we can go for a quick bite for those who want to in order to discuss the film. Hope you can make it and see you there.
item.name: Hartford Area Film Discussion Group November Meetup
